participant_1.background:
I try my best to eat well and get enough sleep, but I'm not always perfect.
I have two personalities, one that is nice to my family and one that is not so nice to others.
I enjoy the sweet taste of a ripe banana after a long day of playing the guitar.
I found a romance novel that my girlfriend would love, but I'm afraid to tell her about it.
i am not really a blond.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about my ability to solve complicated IT problems.
I am content with being a welder and rock climber.
i work as a lifeguard.
I have 2 sisters, but I'm not sure if my car is sentient.
I love listening to classical music while I organize my office supplies on rainy days.

content.text: What's the most interesting thing that's happened to you recently?
I actually found out that my car is sentient. It can talk and everything!
Wait... really? That's actually pretty cool. Have you had any conversations with it?
Oh yeah, we talk all the time. I actually think it's really smart.
I'm not sure I believe you... but I'm intrigued. Can you tell me more about it?
Well, it started out as just a funny thought. I would joke with my friends that my car was talking to me, but then I realized that it actually was!
That's crazy! So what kind of things does it say to you?
It'll just make comments about the weather, or about the traffic. It's not like it's having full-on conversations with me, but it definitely feels like it's sentient.
That's really interesting. I've never heard of anything like that before.
Yeah, it's pretty strange. But it's also kind of cool.
I guess it would be. I mean, if you could talk to your car, that would be pretty convenient.
Right? It would save me a lot of time on my commute.
Well, I'm glad you're enjoying your new friend.
Me too. It's definitely made my life a little more interesting.
